method.text: Blend together the flour, nutmeg and seasoning.
Pan fry the pork in the oil for 4-5 min each side. Remove from pan. Keep warm.
Add the onion to the pan. Cook for 2-3 min until just soft.
Add half the drained peaches, reserving the remainder for garnishing. Add the stock to the pan. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer gently for 10 min.
Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to pack instructions. Drain well.
Remove onion mixture from pan. Stir in the soured cream. Heat through but do not boil, otherwise it will curdle. Return onion mixture to the cream sauce.
Put the cooked pasta in a warmed serving dish. Arrange the pork on top. Pour over the cream sauce. Garnish with peaches.
